        public boolean hasAliens()
        Utility method used to see if the current game state contains active aliens on the board.
        Returns:
        Boolean result of the check for active aliens

        Initializes the game board with Empty Tile objects

      • containsTower

        public boolean containsTower(int row,
                             int col)
        Utility method used to check if a given row,col position on the board contains an Object
        Parameters:
        row - Integer row position to check
        col - Integer col position to check
        Returns:
        boolean result of the check for an existing Object at row,col

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable(int row,
                           int col)
        Utility method used to check if a given location is availabe, i.e, the Tile does not have any BoardCharacter in it AND the Tile is not flagged as restricted.
        Parameters:
        row - Integer row position to check
        col - Integer col position to check
        Returns:
        boolean result of the check of availability of the Tile at row,col

      • getBoard

        public Tile[][] getBoard()
        Public accessor method of the board attribute
        Returns:
        Two-dimensional array of Tile objects

      • getSpacebucks

        public int getSpacebucks()
        Public accessor method of the in-game currency amount, bank
        Returns:
        Integer bank amount

      • placeCharacter

        public void placeCharacter(BoardCharacter character,
                           int row,
                           int col)
        Observable method that places a given BoardCharacter at the specified row, col on the game board. Notifies observers once the change has been made.
        Parameters:
        character - BoardCharacter to place
        row - Integer row position to place
        col - Integer col position to place

      • depositSpacebucks

        public void depositSpacebucks(int amount)
        Observable method that deposits a specified number of currency into the players bank attribute. Notifies observers once the change has been made
        Parameters:
        amount - Integer amount to deposit

      • notifyInvalidPlacement

        public void notifyInvalidPlacement()
        Observable method that extends an INVALID_MOVE notification to the View. This method is called with either a Tile is taken by another character or it is a restricted tile, yielding and invalid move response.

      • notifyInsufficientFunds

        public void notifyInsufficientFunds()
        Observable method that extends an INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS notification to the View. This method is called with the player does not have enough in-game currency to purchase the Tower they have attempted to place.

      • removeTower

        public void removeTower(DefenderTower towerToRemove,
                        int row,
                        int col)
        Observable method that removes a specific tower from the board and process a partial refund with a specified discount constant. Notifies observers once the change has been made.
        Parameters:
        towerToRemove - DefenderTower object to remove from the board
        row - Integer row position of the tower to remove
        col - Integer col position of the tower to remove

      • getDefenderAt

        public DefenderTower getDefenderAt(int row,
                                   int col)
        Utility method to retrieve the DefenderTower located at board[row][col]
        Parameters:
        row - Integer row position to retrieve
        col - Integer col position to retrieve
        Returns:
        DefenderTower object at that position

      • setGameOver

        public void setGameOver()
        Observable method that extends a GAME_OVER notification. This method is called when the game has been lost.

      • setGameWon

        public void setGameWon()
        Observable method that extends a GAME_WON notification. This method is called when the game has been won.

      • displayWaveToast

        public void displayWaveToast()
        Observable method that extends a Toast Message to the View notifying the user of the state-changes in stages waves.

      • setRestrictionedTiles

        public void setRestrictionedTiles(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>> restrictedTiles)
        Utility method that iterates through the game board and restricts specified tiles according to the restrictedTiles Map that is provided. Each Tile that is found to be restricted, its 'restricted' flag will be set to true.
        Parameters:
        restrictedTiles - Map containing restrictedTile information
